Uses of Class
org.switchyard.metadata.ServiceMetadataBuilder

  • Packages that use ServiceMetadataBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.switchyard.metadata  

    • Uses of ServiceMetadataBuilder in org.switchyard.metadata

      Methods in org.switchyard.metadata that return ServiceMetadataBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ServiceMetadataBuilder ServiceMetadataBuilder.create()
      Creates a new ServiceMetadata instance.
      static ServiceMetadataBuilder ServiceMetadataBuilder.createFrom(ServiceMetadata metadata)
      A copy operation which is compatible with the fluent builder API in case changes are necessary.
      ServiceMetadataBuilder ServiceMetadataBuilder.providedPolicies(List<Policy> providedPolicies)
      Specifies provided policies for service metadata.
      ServiceMetadataBuilder ServiceMetadataBuilder.registrant(Registrant registrant)
      Specifies the registrant of a service or service reference associated with this metadata.
      ServiceMetadataBuilder ServiceMetadataBuilder.requiredPolicies(List<Policy> requiredPolicies)
      Specifies required policies for service metadata.
      ServiceMetadataBuilder ServiceMetadataBuilder.security(ServiceSecurity security)
      Specifies service security for service metadata.
      ServiceMetadataBuilder ServiceMetadataBuilder.throttling(Throttling throttling)
      Specifies throttling for service references.
      static ServiceMetadataBuilder ServiceMetadataBuilder.update(ServiceMetadata metadata)
      Used to update an existing instance of ServiceMetadata by chaining additional calls after the call to update().
